MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the LL53 postcode area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 02.45am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a broken pole near Nant Bach affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:16am on 28 December 2020
